text: Nepal competed at the 1984 Summer Olympics in Los Angeles, United States. ==Results by event== ===Athletics=== Men's 400 metres *Pushpa Raj Ojha :* Heat -- 52.12 (→ did not advance) Men's 800 metres *Jodha Gurung :* Heat -- 1:56.72 (→ did not advance) Men's Marathon * Baikuntha Manandhar -- 2:22:52 (→ 46th place) * Arjun Pandit -- 2:32:53 (→ 63rd place) * Amira Prasad Yadal -- 2:38:10 (→ 69th place) ==References== *Official Olympic Reports Category:Nations at the 1984 Summer Olympics 1984 Category:1984 in Nepal
title: Nepal at the 1984 Summer Olympics
